page.title: 11IRVINE * DREGHORN P. SCHOOL
page.content:
Our school, {Dreghorn Primary School, was built in 1908 which makes it 77 years old.At the present moment Dreghorn Primary School is in very good condition.
{In the 1985 term}there are 355 pupils altogether.There are 14 teachers plus a P.E. teacher who comes on a Monday,and a music teacher who comes on a Tuesday.The equipment we use is modern and we like to keep up with the latest in modern technology,computers,videos,etc.
{In our dining_room}120 pupils can be accommodated.
The most popular subject among the pupils, is Art, the least popular Maths.
